issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
UFS background tasks that use the database should check availability and skip work when the database is not up (e.g. cloud controller service restart). The following are examples of UFS background tasks:

* BucketReaperTask
* ReservedNameCleanupEventListener

{code}
Mon Jun 6 23:58:05 2016 ERROR [DbBucketMetadataManagerImpl:QuartzScheduler_Worker-1] [com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.metadata.DbBucketMetadataManagerImpl.lookupBucketsByState(DbBucketMetadataManagerImpl.java):225] Error listing buckets in the state: null due to DB transaction error
com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Databases$DatabaseStateException: Transaction begin failed due to concurrent database synchronization: [] for caller:
com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.metadata.DbBucketMetadataManagerImpl.lookupBucketsByState(DbBucketMetadataManagerImpl.java:215)

fields.summary: UFS background tasks should check database availability

comments.body:
Messages such as the following will now be logged on UFS when work is skipped:

{code}
Tue Jun 7 21:52:23 2016  WARN [MainObjectReaperJob:QuartzScheduler_Worker-2] Skipping job due to database not available
Tue Jun 7 21:52:24 2016  WARN [MainBucketReaperJob:QuartzScheduler_Worker-3] Skipping job due to database not available
Tue Jun 7 21:53:23 2016  WARN [MainObjectReaperJob:QuartzScheduler_Worker-1] Skipping job due to database not available
Tue Jun 7 21:53:24 2016  WARN [MainBucketReaperJob:QuartzScheduler_Worker-2] Skipping job due to database not available
Tue Jun 7 21:54:23 2016  WARN [MainObjectReaperJob:QuartzScheduler_Worker-3] Skipping job due to database not available
Tue Jun 7 21:54:24 2016  WARN [MainBucketReaperJob:QuartzScheduler_Worker-1] Skipping job due to database not available
{code}

The originally report items were addressed along with a couple of other OSG background tasks.
I have seen the new "skipping" messages in the log on clc shutdown.
